description:
We have sourced these 24k Gold plated Franco chains from a quality leading chain factory. These gold plated Franco chains are way different from any others you may find, as these have been made with an real thick layer of 24k gold which has been tested through the toughest of conditions.

Chain specification;

Link width: 4 mm
Length: 36 inches
Style : Franco
Material: Gold plated
Clasp : Lobster claw style
Quality : Grade A
Weight: 80g
